item.title: Dockerfile multi-stage build
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)

item.title: Dockerfile syntax details
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: FROM Specify the base image used to build the image. FROM must be the first instruction in the non-comment line in the Dockerfile.
